name: Liljeholmens Stearinfabriks Medal for the Stockholm Exhibition of 1897
reverse: The statue in the shape of candle that was erected outside the company's pavilion at the exhibition.
description: Liljeholmens Stearinfabriks is a Swedish candle manufacturer.
According to the Swedish wikipedia page for the company:
participated with an enormous crown candle, 23 meters high and 2 1/2 meters in diameter and placed in a 14 meter
high brick candlestick. They also received several Swedish and international awards for the high quality of their candles.'
This medal is made of wax, which is quite appropriate considering the company that made the medal.
The medal comes in a paper box with a color picture of the main exhibition building.
The box reads: 'MINNE AF UTSTÄLLNINGEN I STOCKHOLM 1897.'
